short_summary: AMENDMENT TO RESPONSE DEADLINE: Please ignore the response deadline that appears in the Ariba Discovery posting. You must submit your bid and all required supporting documentation by 2:00 PM EST on February 5, 2024. All bids submitted after 2:00 PM EST will be declared non-responsive. Public Works and Government Services Canada intends to retain the services of a construction management entity, to provide construction management at-risk construction services. The successful Contractor shall provide advisory services and undertake the construction and implementation a new Crown-owned building, which shall provide new office space, including all base building systems as well as the fit-up of office and special purpose space, required to accommodate Government of Canada Departments.
description: Services publics et Approvisionnement Canada (SPAC), retiendra les services d’une entité de gestion de la construction afin de fournir des services de gestion de la construction à risque.
tags: Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
full_summary:
## Government of Canada Tender Announcement: Construction Management Services

* **Tender ID**: WS4350954867
* **Title (English)**: EQ754-240888 - Government of Canada Building (GOCB) Project - Construction Management Services - Phase 1
* **Title (French)**: EQ754-240888 - Projet de construction d’un nouvel immeuble du gouvernement du Canada - Services de gestion de la construction - Phase 1
* **Reference Number**: WS4350954867-Doc4350977778
* **Amendment Number**: 9
* **Date of Publication**: December 18, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: February 5, 2024, 2:00 PM EST
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: November 18, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date**: None (continuous contract)
* **Procurement Category**: CNST (Construction)

**Notice Information**

* **Notice Type**: Invitation to Qualify ( ITQ)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Trade Agreements**: Various Free Trade Agreements mentioned above (text prior to this entry)

**Description of Services**

Public Works and Government Services Canada intends to acquire the services of a Construction Management Entity to provide construction management services at-risk for the construction of a new crown-owned building. The selected contractor will be responsible for providing advisory services and undertaking the construction of a new building that will provide:

*   Office space
*   Base building systems
*   Fit-up of office and special purpose space

**Contact Information**

*   **Name**: Essa, Zobia (SPAC/PSPC)
*   **Email**: zobia.essa@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
*   **Request URL**: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18311100?extsite=MTgzMTExMDBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==



Please review the entire text for government compliance: although the service undergoes continuous contract amendments. ovate and transparent consideration doesn’t constitute pay power.
</details>

Recommendations for improvement to the contractor's initial entry:

1.  **Simplify and standardize language**: Ensure all text is in a clear, professional, and concise format. Avoid using informal language or colloquial expressions.
2.  **Ensure consistency**: Verify consistency in formatting, grammar, and spelling to maintain a professional tone.
